ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23"
SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Vital Signs" (CONF:10254)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.28)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Prior Aid Vitals (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.29)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Additional Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.30)
SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4)
SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Vital Signs" (CONF:10254)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.28)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Prior Aid Vitals (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.29)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Additional Vital Signs Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.30)
